Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive logging infrastructure with real-time progress reporting

Implements a complete logging system for panobbgo with:

- Component-based logging \(Strategy, Heuristic, Analyzer, Results\)
- Real-time progress reporting with symbolic indicators \(ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽŠâ­ðŸ†•.âš ï¸âŒ\)
- Professional status line showing evaluations, ETA, convergence, and best value
- ANSI terminal support with save/restore cursor positioning
- Automatic fallback for non-TTY environments
- Comprehensive test coverage \(13 test cases\)

The progress reporter displays:
- Progress symbols accumulating on one line
- Status line updating in-place on the line below
- Format: [ Evals: XX% \(N/MAX\) | ETA: Xs | Convergence: XX% | Best: X.XXX ]

This provides excellent visibility into optimization processes while
maintaining clean, professional output.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
